title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook bacon. Whisk eggs and cheese. Combine all ingredients with pasta off heat to prevent scrambling.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Grill chicken. Prepare masala sauce with tomatoes, onion, and spices. Add cream. Simmer with chicken until tender.
